name: Satellite Systems
description: Bus, payload, and TT&C refreshers tied to current Delta sustainment orders.

cards.title: Bus vs Payload Power Budget
cards.description: Reconcile battery depth-of-discharge ceilings with payload duty cycles so commanding honors EPS red lines documented in AFSPCMAN 91-710. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: Guardians keep payload plans inside the published power profile every time.

cards.title: ADCS Momentum Dump Matrix
cards.description: Validate attitude control momentum wheels against sensor tasking, identifying when thruster unloads must be scheduled with SDA coordination. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: Prevent surprise unloads by trending ADCS momentum daily.

cards.title: Thermal Balance Audit
cards.description: Cross-check hot and cold case configuration limits before commanding payload heaters or solar array slews during eclipse season. Ref: AFI 91-217.
cards.summaryText: No thermal surprises when the eclipse season hits if you rehearse the limits now.

cards.title: Protected SATCOM Crosslinks
cards.description: Practice configuring crosslink schedules, crypto loads, and beam shaping for AEHF or WGS payloads per CJCSI 6250.01. Ref: SDP 3-0.
cards.summaryText: Crosslink settings stay aligned with DISA tasking when Guardians rehearse the workflow.

cards.title: GPS Block III Modernization
cards.description: Track L1C/L2C payload availability, M-code power settings, and NAVSTAR control segments so users get accurate NAVWAR reporting. Ref: AFCSM 11-2GPS.
cards.summaryText: Keep GPS modernization notes sharp to defend NAVWAR readiness reports.

cards.title: TT&C Link Margin Walk
cards.description: Calculate uplink/downlink Eb/N0, antenna pointing loss, and weather fade margins before scheduling commanding passes. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: Validate TT&C links numerically so command windows aren't gambles.

cards.title: On-Orbit Cyber Hardening
cards.description: Review secure command authentication, crypto period changes, and FIPS 140-3 module status before each crew turnover. Ref: DoDI 8530.01.
cards.summaryText: Treat satellites like weapon systems by enforcing cyber hygiene every shift.

cards.title: Contingency Safe Modes
cards.description: Rehearse transition steps for safe-hold, including sun-pointing attitudes, transmitter inhibits, and telemetry subset availability. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: When busses tumble, only rehearsed crews recover them fast.

cards.title: Payload Calibration Cadence
cards.description: Plan calibration events, ground truth comparisons, and data quality flags so ISR customers trust your product lines. Ref: AFDP 2-0.
cards.summaryText: Cal plans keep payload credibility high with every intel customer.

cards.title: Redundant Chain Switchover
cards.description: Step through command sequences for switching to redundant TT&C or payload chains, logging verification telemetry. Ref: AFSPCI 10-1204.
cards.summaryText: Practice redundant chain swaps before the anomaly makes it mandatory.

cards.title: Degradation Reporting Battle Drill
cards.description: Align anomaly logs, mission impact assessments, and MAJCOM reporting templates so leadership decisions stay fast. Ref: AFMAN 91-223.
cards.summaryText: Anomalies only stay small when reporting muscle memory is strong.

cards.title: Configuration Control Review
cards.description: Walk through every active command plan, pending script, and inhibit tag before releasing the weekly ops summary. Ref: AFI 63-125.
cards.summaryText: Clear configs mean fewer unforced errors on console.
